item.title: Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price
item.description:
Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price

The two words "Silicon Valley" immediately stir up stereotypes, stigma and maybe an HBO show. The name has become a cultural reflex, and that's what photographer Helena Price wants to change with her ambitious, large-scale portrait and interview series. Techies Project, launched today, is a collection of 100 in-depth interviews that breaks this idea of the "sameness" plaguing the area.

item.title: Thinking inside the box: Prepd reinvents the lunchbox.
item.description:
Thinking inside the box: Prepd reinvents the lunchbox.

Packing attention to detail, intelligent design and delicious food into lunchtime is San Francisco-based team Prepd, founded by Chris Place and Will Matters. Their creation, 'Prepd Pack', is a modern take on the classic lunchbox, launched in January 2016 via a Kickstarter campaign that raised over $1 million.

item.title: Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.
item.description:
Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.

Aboard commercial cargo ships is where the Container Artist Residency 01 program is finding its abode. Completely isolated from the rest of the world, the Residency allows its artists to work in a remote space with no tangible lines of communication to the outside world.

item.title: From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence

What was once just a figment of the imagination of some our most famous science fiction writers, artificial intelligence (AI) is taking root in our everyday lives. We're still a few years away from having robots at our beck and call, but AI has already had a profound impact in more subtle ways.

item.title: Light painting with pixelstick
item.description:
Light painting with pixelstick

More info at thepixelstick.com! We spent the last year building pixelstick, a light painting tool capable of everything from photo-real renders to amazing abstract ribbons. We've improved with every iteration and are excited to finally show off what it can do. Everything was shot by just two slightly sleep deprived guys and one Pixelstick in Brooklyn.

item.title: 21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away
item.description:
21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away

Take a break from hotels and resorts and get back to nature with one of these amazing treehouse accommodations that combine comfort with the thrill of being immersed in nature. Some of them are rustic cabins built into the canopy of majestic trees, others make for luxurious nature retreats, yet others are true architectural marvels with high-tech interiors and contemporary amenities.
